speech:
Public health centers in each city and county open various smoking cessation clinics,
Through the measurement of carbon monoxide in the body and the analysis of body fat percentage,
It suggests a way to quit smoking for individuals.
It's good to prepare for quitting smoking 7 to 15 days before quitting smoking and quit at once.

"It's a good idea to visit a smoking cessation clinic for medical treatment.
Smoking cessation clinic site (http://mdon.co.kr/mobile/article.html?no=32373)"
When you quit smoking, go through the first week well. On the third day, withdrawal symptoms begin in earnest, and it takes about 3 to 7 days for nicotine to be released from the body.
Make a new habit. Try to make movements that are simple but require continuous deep breathing frequently. You'll be able to forget your cigarette thoughts for a moment with a hard breath.
Start with active methods such as consulting your doctor, smoking cessation aids, and so on.

Try an 8- or 12-week smoking cessation treatment program. From the third visit, the government will pay the entire treatment fee, and if you complete the entire program, you can get a refund for the first and second treatment fees you paid.

If you made up your mind, decide on a date to quit smoking
It is recommended that smoking cessation days are usually set from 7 to 10 days later.
If you hold it too far back, you are likely to be disturbed.
It's good to avoid stressful times.
If you set a non-smoking day ahead of the test, you are more likely to fail.

Withdrawal symptoms get worse three to four days after quitting smoking
It gets worst in 3 to 4 days and disappears in 2 to three weeks.
It is recommended to breathe fresh air or exercise during smoking cessation.

While quitting smoking, chewing silver, chewing unsweetened gum,
Drinking cold water and brushing your teeth are also helpful.

Nicotine patches and nicotine gum help you quit smoking.
Use this method with the help of a doctor.
